page.title: 05Shopping in Abercynon
page.content: Our group is looking at{trade}in our Domesday block.We have interviewed{ {shoppers}and{shopkeepers}in Abercynon shopping centre.By doing that we have found out that most people shop in Abercynon but don't do a lot of shopping there because the biggest shop,the Co-op,with the most variety closed down a year ago.Because it has closed shopkeepers think most people catch the free buses to supermarkets like Adco,Carrefour and Tesco.We found out that most people do not use free buses and that the best shopping day is Friday.We asked the shopkeepers twelve questions and most of the answers were the same.They want a better car-park and the council to improve the shopping centre but not many people think that the{Abercynon {by-pass}will affect their trade.It will open in 1986.
